Animated Mechanism.name: Animated Mechanism
Animated Mechanism.description: Shoot a projectile at the nearest enemy every 3 seconds. Projectiles deal 200% (+100% per stack) damage on impact. Cooldown is reduced with less hp, up to 0.42 times per second at 1 hp.

Beating Heart.name: Beating Heart
Beating Heart.description: On death, respawn in the Red Plane. Single use per stack.

Lifetime Fortune.name: Lifetime Fortune
Lifetime Fortune.description: Grants a buff every 10,000 gold earned that grants +50% health and damage for 30 (+30 per stack) seconds.

Shell Piece.name: Shell Piece
Shell Piece.description: When taking damage that would kill you, instead receive 2 seconds of invincibility. Can activate 1 (+1 per stack) time(s) per stage.

Toxic Tail.name: Toxic Tail
Toxic Tail.description: Spawn 2 (+2 per stack) friendly boars which attack enemies.

Unearthly Lamp.name: Unearthly Lamp
Unearthly Lamp.description: Every second attack fires 1 (+1 per stack) projectile dealing 125% damage.

Armed Backpack.name: Armed Backpack
Armed Backpack.description: 18.5% (+6.5% per stack) chance of firing a bullet behind you for 150% damage. 100% chance at 14 stacks.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.description: Deal 35% extra damage to enemies within 30 (+13 per stack) pixels.

Coffee Bag.name: Coffee Bag
Coffee Bag.description: Increases movement speed by 10% (+10% per stack) and attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5% per stack).

Detritive Trematode.name: Detritive Trematode
Detritive Trematode.description: Attacked enemies receive damage over time (4% max hp per second for 7 seconds) when they drop below 3% hp. Stacks non-linearly increase the health threshold, up to 100% at 35 stacks.

Diary.name: Diary
Diary.description: Earn 0.84 (+0.84 per stack) experience points per second.

Distinctive Stick.name: Distinctive Stick
Distinctive Stick.description: Grows a tree at the Teleporter's location, healing players within 100 (+40 per stack) pixels.

Dormant Fungus.name: Dormant Fungus
Dormant Fungus.description: While moving, heal around 1% (non-linear increase per stack) of your health every 1.8 seconds.

Fork.name: Fork
Fork.description: Increases base damage by 25% (+25% per stack).

Guarding Amulet.name: Guarding Amulet
Guarding Amulet.description: Reduces damage taken from behind you by 40% (non-linear increase per stack).

Ice Tool.name: Ice Tool
Ice Tool.description: Gain 1 (+1 per stack) extra jump(s) on walls, increases speed by 30% (+30% per stack) while climbing.

Malice.name: Malice
Malice.description: Dealt damage spreads to 1 (+1 per stack) enemy/enemies within 40 (+5 per stack) pixels for 55% damage.

Molten Coin.name: Molten Coin
Molten Coin.description: 6% chance to blaze enemies for 6 (+4 per stack) seconds, and earn +$1 (+$1 per stack). Blaze deals 20% damage 1 per second.

Needles.name: Needles
Needles.description: 4% (+2% per stack) chance to mark enemies on hit for 3 seconds. Marked enemies receive 100% extra critical strike chance. 100% chance to mark at 49 stacks.

Wonder Herbs.name: Wonder Herbs
Wonder Herbs.description: Increases healing from all sources by 12% (+12% per stack).

Curse of Affliction.name: Curse of Affliction
Curse of Affliction.description: Falling below 50% (+15% per stack) health gives negative regeneration.

Curse of Confusion.name: Curse of Confusion
Curse of Confusion.description: every (1 / stacks) minute, Controls are reversed for 5 (+ 6 / stacks) seconds.

Curse of Impairment.name: Curse of Impairment
Curse of Impairment.description: 33% chance to miss an attack. Stacks logarithmically grow the chance.

Curse of Misfortune.name: Curse of Misfortune
Curse of Misfortune.description: Reduce the rarity of nearby items, rerolling them. A second stack guarantees Common items.

Curse of Mortality.name: Curse of Mortality
Curse of Mortality.description: Consecutive hits deal more damage to you. Stacks increase time frame for consecutive hits.

Curse of Poverty.name: Curse of Poverty
Curse of Poverty.description: Lose gold every second. Stacks increase gold loss.

Bane Flask.name: Bane Flask
Bane Flask.description: Killed enemies spread their debuffs and DOT effects to nearby enemies. Applies bane, dealing 30% damage every 2 seconds. Stacks increase radus by 100%.

Composite Injector.name: Composite Injector
Composite Injector.description: Merge one dropped use item with the one equipped. 1 Additional merge per stack.

Droid Head.name: Droid Head
Droid Head.description: Spawns a helping drone for 11 (+4 per stack) seconds after killing boss enemies.

Erratic Gadget.name: Erratic Gadget
Erratic Gadget.description: Critical strikes deal 50% (+50% per stack) extra damage.

Galvanic Core.name: Galvanic Core
Galvanic Core.description: 10% (+7% per stack) chance to stun. Stunned enemies debuff all nearby enemies, reducing their hp by 20%, speed by 0.8 and damage by 30%.

Green Chocolate.name: Green Chocolate
Green Chocolate.description: Receiving 25% or more of your health as damage increases your critical chance and damage for 5 (+4 per stack) seconds.

Insecticide.name: Insecticide
Insecticide.description: All attacks poison enemies for 25% damage over 4 (+2 per stack) seconds.

Juddering Egg.name: Juddering Egg
Juddering Egg.description: Gain 1 (+1 per stack) young wurm follower which attacks nearby enemies.

Nkota's Heritage.name: Nkota's Heritage
Nkota's Heritage.description: Creates a free chest on level up. Stacks increase the chance of higher rarity chests.

Portable Reactor.name: Portable Reactor
Portable Reactor.description: Become invincible for 40 (+15 per stack) seconds after entering a stage. Maximum of 150 seconds at 8 stacks.

Swift Skateboard.name: Swift Skateboard
Swift Skateboard.description: Allows for movement during skill use. Stacks increase speed during skill use by +70%.

Toys.name: Baby's Toys
Toys.description: -3 levels on pickup, however you keep all stats (Reduced level up experience requirement). Further stacks repeat this effect.

Relic of Duality.name: Relic of Duality
Relic of Duality.description: All attacks apply burning damage over time, getting hit freezes you. Stacks increase duration of the effects.

Relic of Echelon.name: Relic of Echelon
Relic of Echelon.description: Each use item activation grants you an 8 (+6 per stack) second buff that increases health by 5000 and damage by 150. Increases use item cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

Relic of Entropy.name: Relic of Entropy
Relic of Entropy.description: Rolls a random effect of the following: free gold, two enemies spawn, burn everyone nearby (including you), apply the void debuff, warp you to the spawn, warp you to the teleporter.

Relic of Extinction.name: Relic of Extinction
Relic of Extinction.description: A black hole follows you, dealing extreme damage on proximity. Stacks increase the size of the black hole.

Relic of Force.name: Relic of Force
Relic of Force.description: Increases damage by 100% (+100%(multiplicative) per stack), reduces attack speed and cooldowns by 40% (-40%(multiplicative) per stack).

Relic of Gratification.name: Relic of Gratification
Relic of Gratification.description: Enemies drop 150% experience and gold, but enemies deal 150% damage to you. Stacks multiplicatively.

Relic of Mass.name: Relic of Mass
Relic of Mass.description: Increases health by 100% (+100% per stack), speed requires momentum (slower momentum buildup per stack).

Relic of Vitality.name: Relic of Vitality
Relic of Vitality.description: Increases regeneration by 12 hp/s, reduces health by 75% and armor by 50%. Stacks multiplicatively.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description: Receiving damage charges dark energy. Unleash a devastating blackout on full charge.

Entangled Energy.name: Entangled Energy
Entangled Energy.description: Create an energetic discharge if 4 or more enemies stand in a line in front of you.

Nucleus Gems.name: Nucleus Gems
Nucleus Gems.description: Gold drops become sharp gems that deal 200% damage per second while in contact with enemies.

Oracle's Ordeal.name: Oracle's Ordeal
Oracle's Ordeal.description: All relevant map interactables are shown by arrows.

Stirring Soul.name: Stirring Soul
Stirring Soul.description: Killed enemies leave a soul. Souls have a chance of turning into items on contact.

Thriving Growth.name: Thriving Growth
Thriving Growth.description: Killed enemies leave flowers which increase movement speed by 20% and heal you by 2% of your max health every second.

Yearning Demise.name: Yearning Demise
Yearning Demise.description: Picking up items annihilates the nearest enemies.

Balloon.name: Balloon
Balloon.description: Decreases your gravity by 30%. Stacks further decrease gravity multiplicatively.

Broken Blood Tester.name: Broken Blood Tester
Broken Blood Tester.description: Earn +2 (+2 per stack) gold for every 15 hp regenerated.

Crowning Valiance.name: Crowning Valiance
Crowning Valiance.description: All stats are increased when a boss is in proximity. Stacks boost stats further.

Cryptic Source.name: Cryptic Source
Cryptic Source.description: Changing direction creates bursts of energy that deal 70% (+55% per stack) damage.

Field Accelerator.name: Field Accelerator
Field Accelerator.description: Teleporters charge 100% (+100% per stack) faster when no enemies are around.

Gold Medal.name: Gold Medal
Gold Medal.description: Spending gold heals you for 5 (+2 per stack) seconds.

Hottest Sauce.name: Hottest Sauce
Hottest Sauce.description: Activating a use item burns the ground and all nearby enemies for 5 (+4 per stack) seconds.

Hunter's Sigil.name: Hunter's Sigil
Hunter's Sigil.description: Standing still increases armor by 15 (+10 per stack) and Critical Strike chance by 25% (+20% per stack).

Low Quality Speakers.name: Low Quality Speakers
Low Quality Speakers.description: Earn a speed boost at 45% health or lower. Stacks increase boost duration.

Metachronic Trinket.name: Metachronic Trinket
Metachronic Trinket.description: Teleporter charge time is reduced by 10 (+10 per stack) seconds

Poisonous Gland.name: Poisonous Gland
Poisonous Gland.description: On getting hit while at full health, create a cloud of poison for 200% (+120% per stack) dps.

Prototype Jet Boots.name: Prototype Jet Boots
Prototype Jet Boots.description: Explode on jump for 150% (+150% per stack) damage.

Roulette.name: Roulette
Roulette.description: Get a random stat buff every minute. Stacks increase buff strength by 50%.

Strange Can.name: Strange Can
Strange Can.description: 8.5% (+5% per stack) chance to intoxicate enemies for 350% damage over time.

Voltaic Gauge.name: Voltaic Gauge
Voltaic Gauge.description: Killing elites drops orbs that grant 60 (+50 per stack) temporary shield.

Watch Metronome.name: Watch Metronome
Watch Metronome.description: Standing Still for up to 4 seconds charges movement speed for up to 2 (+2 per stack) seconds.

Ageless Totem.name: Ageless Totem
Ageless Totem.description: Become an aspect of Ethereality. On use creates an Ethereal explosion.

Back Thruster.name: Back Thruster
Back Thruster.description: Gain an acceleration boost for 4 seconds.

Caustic Pearl.name: Caustic Pearl
Caustic Pearl.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Caustic Pearl.description: Leave a trail that deals 20% corrosive damage to enemies. All attacks deal corrosive damage.

Counterfeit Teleporter.name: Counterfeit Teleporter
Counterfeit Teleporter.description: Place a teleporter anywhere. The item is removed upon use.

Eclipsing Shard.name: Eclipsing Shard
Eclipsing Shard.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Eclipsing Shard.description: Nearby enemies receive the Void debuff.

Fractured Crown.name: Fractured Crown
Fractured Crown.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Fractured Crown.description: Every 10 seconds, fire a laser at the nearest enemy for 20x14% damage.

Greater Warbanner.name: Greater Warbanner
Greater Warbanner.description: Place a warbanner which decreases skill cooldowns, increasing critical strike chance by 20 and health by 100.

M.I.D.A.S.name: M.I.D.A.S
M.I.D.A.S.description: Deducts 50% of your health, earning the same amount as gold.
M.I.D.A.S.embryo: Earns you double the amount of gold.

Mind-shift Gas.name: Mind-shift Gas
Mind-shift Gas.description: Throw a canister which releases a gas for 10 seconds. The gas makes attack each other.

Pressurized Propeller.name: Pressurized Propeller
Pressurized Propeller.description: Launch yourself high in the air.

Pylon Fragment.name: Pylon Fragment
Pylon Fragment.description: Partially restore the Pylon's health in the Red Plane, the item is removed upon use.

Roller.name: Roller
Roller.description: Launch a moving roller forwards, the roller stuns and ground enemies on contact for 6 seconds.

Seismic Oscillator.name: Seismic Oscillator
Seismic Oscillator.description: Start an earthquake which damages all grounded enemies for 65% damage.

Simple Magnet.name: Simple Magnet
Simple Magnet.description: Pull surrounding pickups towards you. 10% Chance to unearth a treasure.
Simple Magnet.embryo: Increases chance by 10%. Doubled active duration.

White Flag.name: White Flag
White Flag.description: Place a white flag which disallows everyone inside its radius to attack or take damage for 8 seconds.
